name: Skyward Summit
description:
Skyward Summit is a thrilling 2D platformer for the Nintendo Gameboy and Gameboy Color, developed and published by Larsonsoft. In the game, players control a brave young girl named Emma as she embarks on a quest to reach the top of a mysterious mountain. According to legend, the mountain is home to a powerful wish-granting item, and Emma hopes to use it to save her grandmother's life. 

Players must guide Emma through 4 short, tall levels. With intuitive controls, vibrant graphics, and a compelling story, Skyward Summit is a must-play for fans of 2d platformers. Don't miss out on this exciting and challenging adventure – grab your copy of Skyward Summit today!

Also Featuring Ribby from Ribby: The Game! (Created & Owned by Octolivvy)
